Welcome to Flask JWT Router Documentation
=========================================


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   jwt_routes
   google
   authentication
   entity
   config
   routing

Features
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
* Out of the box authentication with JSON Web tokens
* Whitelist routes
* Optional Authenticated entity available on flask's g object


Installation::

       pip install flask-jwt-router
